GlossaryÂ¶

individual
A candidate solution
solution
A bitstring
population
A collection of individuals
fitness
A quality measure of an individual
generation
An iteration of the EA
gene
The basic representation of an individual
chromosome
A set of genes of an individual
crossover
A recombination of two individuals’ genomes
mutation
A permutation of an individual’s genome
elite
Individuals preserved from the old population and allowed into the new population
fitness function
A function used to evaluate the fitness of an individual
